resources.string:
©sunilpaulmathew

Credits
Grarak: KernelAdiutor (code base)
topjohnwu: Magisk (on-boot service)
Toxinpiper: App Icon
Please use an external \'File Manager\' to pick your file. Selecting files via the default \'DocumentsUI\' is not yet supported.
Click here, or the add button at the bottom, to create or import a shell script.
%s will be executed in late_start service!
Script name shouldn\'t be empty! Aborting.
This app won\'t work without Root Access! Aborting.
%s is excluded from the on boot service!
On-boot settings are already enabled for %s. Any further changes on this script won\'t be applied On-boot, unless you re-enable that switch!
Permission denied for writing to storage!
A script named %s is already exists! Aborting.

To apply this script, simply download the file and import into Script Manager.
Script Manager %s can be obtained from
PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartpack.scriptmanager
GitHub: 
https://github.com/SmartPack/ScriptManager/raw/master/release/com.smartpack.scriptmanager.apk
Failed to get latest version information!
%s\n\n**Important: Please download and manually update the app!**
Please select a file with %s extension.

Welcome to Script Manager

This app can be used to create, import, edit and easily execute any properly formatted shell scripts in few clicks. An option to execute scripts on boot is also available only for devices rooted with Magisk.

Please be noted that this app is, however, too powerful to messed up your device. The developer of this app won't take any responsibility, if something wrong happened to your device.

 *** USE AT YOUR OWN RISK> ***
%s is not a proper script file! Aborting.
